alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 15 at 9:31AM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Humboldt River At Comus affecting Humboldt County zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. For the Lower Humboldt...including Palisade, Battle Mountain, Comus...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Humboldt River At Comus. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Minor Flood Stage. Minor lowland flooding throughout the reach. No flooding in Winnemucca. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am PDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Humboldt River Comus 9.5 5.8 Sat 10 am PDT 6.7 7.3 8.7 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 915 PM PDT.
